history.content:
• Wednesday, 11am-3pm at Field Club, Memorial Stadium 

Remember to bring your Cal ID and multiple copies of your resume! Companies will be hiring for internships AND full-time positions. 

Participating employers are seeking EECS undergraduates and graduates students. They include: A9, Adobe, AdRise (TubiTV), Airbnb, Amazon, Capital One, Castlight Health, Databricks, Electronic Arts, EMC, Facebook, Google, IXL Learning, Juniper Networks, Lightspeed Ventures, Linkedin, Lockheed Martin, Micron, Microsoft, National Instruments, Okta, Palo Alto Networks, Quantcast, Salesforce, SanDisk, Splunk, Texas Instruments, Thumbtack, Twitch, Twitter, Wish, Workday, Yelp...and many more!

For this year's EECS Internship Fair, we're excited to leverage Mounza. Once you RSVP for the event the app or website, you can upload your resume. You can also view the companies attending as well as view the career fair map directly on your desktop, iPhone or Android. 

If you have any questions regarding the fair, then please contact Atalie at acchan@eecs.berkeley.edu.
history.subject: EECS Internship Fair is Wednesday!
